# Interactive Data Table

Below is a basic interactive data table, rendered client-side using **Observable**.

```{ojs}
import {Table} from "@observablehq/inputs"

data = FileAttachment("data/table.csv").csv({typed: true})

viewof table = Table(data, {
  search: true,
  sortable: true,
  width: "100%"
})
```

# Data Visualization

Below is a bar chart showing the values by person and country.

```{ojs}
Plot = require("@observablehq/plot")

Plot.plot({
  marginLeft: 60,
  x: {
    grid: true,
    label: "Value"
  },
  y: {
    label: "Name"
  },
  color: {
    legend: true,
    label: "Country"
  },
  marks: [
    Plot.barX(data, {
      x: "Value",
      y: "Name",
      fill: "Country",
      sort: {y: "-x"},
      tip: true
    }),
    Plot.ruleX([0])
  ]
})
```
